Header: The Premier is set to visit Norway
Content: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe will leave for Norway tomorrow. During his official visit, the Premier is scheduled to meet Prime Minister of Norway, Erna Solberg and President of Storting, Tone WilhelmsenTroen and Foreign Minister, Ine Marie Eriksen. The Prime Minister will speak on bilateral interests. Minister of Fisheries and Aquatic Resources and Rural Economic Affairs VijithVijyamuniZoysa, Parliamentarians Kavinda Jayawardena and HeshaWithanage have also joined the tour. The Premier is expected to tour in London following the Norway visit.
